title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, Rams, NFL
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, Rams, NFL
description:
Russell Westbrook deserves praise for adjusting his role with the Lakers

Colin doesn't believe the rumors that Rams head coach Sean McVay will retire.

Thoughts on the NFL trade deadline

 

Guest: Kevin Clark
